department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: This contract is for the procurement of a E-Pontoon boat from Thibault Marine. The procurement is subject to the the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). The procurement has been limited to a single supplier due to the protection of patents, copyrights, and other exclusive rights. The contract will be delivered on a sole-source basis, meaning that only Thibault Marine has been selected for the contract.
description: Thibault Marine has been selected as the sole supplier for the procurement of a E-Pontoon boat. The contract was published as an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN), which allows for the pre-identification of a supplier for a contract that is expected to be awarded.
tags: Public Works and Government Services Canada
